## Mixture of Bivariate Normals

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
set.seed(134)
N <- 1e3
MASS::mvrnorm(n = N, mu = c(1,3), Sigma = diag(c(0.1,0.1))) %>% 
  as.data.frame() %>% 
  mutate(Type = 1) %>% 
  bind_rows({
    MASS::mvrnorm(n = N, mu = c(4,2), Sigma = diag(c(0.1,0.1))) %>% 
      as.data.frame() %>% 
      mutate(Type = 2)
  }) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=V1,y=V2)) +
    geom_point(aes(color=Type))
  
```
